Package org.opensourcephysics.frames

Class DisplayFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • java.awt.Window
          • java.awt.Frame
            • javax.swing.JFrame
              • org.opensourcephysics.display.OSPFrame
                • org.opensourcephysics.display.DrawingFrame
                  • org.opensourcephysics.frames.DisplayFrame

  • public class DisplayFrame
extends org.opensourcephysics.display.DrawingFrame
    A DrawingFrame with an empty drawing panel. Programs should add drawables to this frame using the addDrawable method. ClearData removes all drawables from this frame.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
